Name: Chania
Description: A region known for its Venetian architecture, beautiful beaches, and the Samaria Gorge.

Name: Rethymno
Description: A region famous for its well-preserved Renaissance architecture and beautiful coastline.

Name: Heraklion
Description: The most populous region in Crete, home to the ancient palace of Knossos and the capital city of Heraklion.

Name: Lasithi
Description: A region in the eastern part of Crete, known for its beaches, caves, and the Lassithi Plateau.
